title: Tether Reports $3.2B Excess Reserves, but Lags in Reducing Secured Loans
description: Tether reported $3.2 billion of excess reserves backing the value of its stablecoins including USDT, according to its Q3 attestation released Wednesday.

title: Bitcoin Stands Tall: Will Ripple (XRP), Polygon (MATIC), and Polkadot (DOT) Follow or Forge Ahead?
description: Delve into the dynamic cryptocurrency landscape with our comprehensive analysis of Ripple (XRP), Polygon (MATIC), and Polkadot (DOT). Amidst a tapestry of market signals and notable price shifts, gain valuable insights into recent bullish trends, potential price points, and pivotal technical levels shaping the future of these prominent digital assets.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried fails to remember anything in court
description: During his testimony, Sam Bankman-Fried, a key figure in the crypto world and co-founder of Alameda Research, experienced moments of uncertainty when questioned by US Assistant Attorney Danielle Sassoon. Sam Bankman-Fried faced queries about Alameda Research, the crypto trading firm he co-founded, and assertions related to his bankrupt trading firm being subject to the same ... Read more

title: Bittrex’s Bankruptcy Filing Approved By US Courts
description:
Judge Brendan Shannon  approved the liquidation of crypto exchange Bittrex at a hearing in Delaware on Monday, October 30, permitting the company to proceed with its bankruptcy plans. The approval would allow Bittrex to carry out plans for winding down its U.S. operations.  According to the reports, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) accused Bittrex’s […]

The post Bittrex’s Bankruptcy Filing Approved By US Courts appeared first on Coin Edition.
